column4: yeah its some odd mashup of gnome, unity, metacity, and compiz
I dont quite get where one ends and the others begin
yeah I dont mind Unity too much, but I think Id still prefer it if they had just cleaned up the old UI rather than reinventing the wheel

sebas_, if you don't have any more support questions, you may continue to discuss the differences between GNOME and Unity in either #ubuntu-discuss or #ubuntu-offtopick, please leave this channel open for support.
